subject: AI & Agents
title: Deepfakes and Consent
description: A quick, practical guide to Deepfakes and Consent.

hook.text: A student finds a realistic fake video of herself online. She never consented. Nobody told her.

buildup.text: Deepfake technology can generate realistic images and videos of anyone from a few photos.

discovery.text: Non-consensual deepfakes disproportionately target women and are used for harassment.

twist.text: The technology is free and easy to use. Creating a deepfake takes minutes, not expertise.

climax.text: Laws are catching up. Several countries now criminalize non-consensual deepfakes.

punchline.text: Technology moved faster than consent. The law races to catch up.

quiz.question: Who are disproportionately targeted by non-consensual deepfakes?
